SEARCH
Package ru.ifmo.se.collectionManager

Class CollectionManager

java.lang.Object
ru.ifmo.se.collectionManager.CollectionManager
public class CollectionManager extends Object
The CollectionManager class is responsible for managing a collection of MusicBand objects. It provides methods for adding, updating, removing, and retrieving elements from the collection. The class also handles serialization and deserialization of the collection to/from XML format.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    CollectionManager.Wrapper
    A nested class used for XML serialization and deserialization of the collection.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public boolean add(MusicBand element)
      Adds a music band to the collection with a newly generated ID.
      Parameters:
      element - the music band to add
      Returns:
      true if the element was added successfully

    • updateById

      public boolean updateById(int id, MusicBand element)
      Updates a music band in the collection by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the music band to update
      element - the new music band data
      Returns:
      true if the element was updated successfully, false if no element with the given ID was found

      public Stream<MusicBand> getItems()
      Returns a stream of all music bands in the collection, sorted by ID.
      Returns:

      Returns the number of music bands in the collection.

      Returns information about the collection, including its type, initialization date, and size.
      Returns:

    • serialize

      public void serialize(Writer to)
      Serializes the collection to XML format and writes it to the specified Writer.
      Parameters:
      to - the Writer to write the XML to

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks if the collection is valid. A valid collection must not be null, must have a non-null initialization date, and must contain at least one valid music band.
      Returns:
      true if the collection is valid, false otherwise

    • deserialize

      public static CollectionManager deserialize(Reader from) throws IOException, WrongInputException
      Deserializes a collection from XML format.
      Parameters:
      from - the Reader to read the XML from
      Returns:
      a new CollectionManager containing the deserialized collection
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      WrongInputException - if the XML contains invalid data
